channel.title: Welcome on Building Sustainable Solutions on Azure
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Building Sustainable Solutions on Azure

item.title: Customer scenario
item.description: Teams will become familiar with the customer’s current state, needs, objections and start developing a PowerPoint presentation.

item.title: Design solution
item.description: As a team you’ll propose a solution architecture that addresses the customer case study.

item.title: Optimise architecture
item.description: Teams will apply WAF practices to the proposed solution for quality.

item.title: Present proposal
item.description: Teams present their proposed solution architecture and deployment strategy emulating a real customer’s presentation and identify strengths and areas of improvement of their proposed solution.
